items.title: Davidson Downgrades Salesforce, Inc. (CRM) to Sell: Jim Cramer Says ‘It Was Very Funny’
items.description: We recently published an article titled Jim Cramer Says AI Is Back & Discusses These 10 Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) stands against the other stocks. In a recent appearance on CNBC’s Squawk on the Street, Jim Cramer commented on how market sentiment towards AI […]
